about_the_game:
The Spirit Guide calls upon you and you must oblige. The lands once protected by the Ryuu Brothers have been compromised and you, the last remaining Ryuu, must cast away the unknown enemy and uncover the fate of your brothers.

Begin your journey at the World Temple where you will meet the Spirit Guide.

DEFEND YOUR ARTIFACT

  • Summon totems - towers - and upgrade them using fragments
  • Equip spells at the World Temple and use them to get an advantage over your enemies
  • Use environmental interactions to deny enemy powers

LEARN THE LEVELS

  • Collect gems scattered around the levels to upgrade your abilities and craft monolith tokens
  • Find hidden portals to the Ascendant Realm at night time and ascend your spirit
  • Use Guiding Eyes to teleport yourself to strategic locations and create shockwaves

CONTENT

  • 10 handcrafted levels with different gameplay modifiers and possibilities
  • Multiple bosses that can change the dynamic of the battle
  • 5 artifacts that enable you to use different spell combinations
  • Enemy curses that will empower your enemies, giving you extra challenges
  • Cinematic cutscenes

MONETIZATION

  • No microtransactions
  • Only free updates

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600, 3.3 GHz or AMD Ryzen 5 1500X, 3.5 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti, 2 GB or AMD Radeon R7 360, 2 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Minimum system requirements might change in the future

short_description: LANDS OF RYUU is a tower defense game that brings strategy and exploration together. Defend your homeland against waves of enemies using totems, spells and other manifestations of your power.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Spanish - Latin America, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal
